english.segment1: I've taken every word you say to me with of grain of salt. And it's not just your fault anymore. If you would have thought back way before it all went bad. You might have taken to heart the things we had
english.segment2: That's enough from me for a little while. Not that you could see through a sorry smile. And in case you can't tell you've broken this shell of me
